message.name: ERR_UTILITY_RNFE_UTILITY
message.locale: A utility must be entered for this utility payment.

message.name: ERR_HBI_XFV_CLIENT_PAYMENT_AMOUNT_EMPTY
message.locale: The payment amount must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_HBI_XFV_CLIENT_PMT_AMT_LESS
message.locale: The payment amount must be equal to or greater than the utility company minimum amount of %1s.

message.name: ERR_HBI_XFV_CLIENT_PAYMENT_RATE_GREATER
message.locale: The amount specified is greater than the maximum amount payable to the utility. You may specify a maximum of %1s percent of this component payable to this utility.

message.name: ERR_UTILITYPAYMENT_FV_FAILURE_LIST
message.locale: The following utility payment details are invalid:%1s

message.name: ERR_UTILITYPAYMENT_PMT_STARTDATE_FAILURE
message.locale: A utility payment cannot be created from a date which has already been paid in respect of this case, the earliest date from which a utility payment can be created is '%1d'.

message.name: ERR_UTILITYPAYMENT_XFV_STARTDATE_CASESTART
message.locale: The start date of the utility payment cannot be before the case start date [%1d].

message.name: ERR_HBI_FV_NO_CUSTOMERACCNAME
message.locale: The account name must be specified for this utility payment.

message.name: ERR_HBI_FV_NO_CUSTOMERACCNUMBER
message.locale: The account number must be specified for this utility payment.

message.name: ERR_HBI_XFV_PAYMENT_AMOUNT_GREATER
message.locale: The payment amount entered must not exceed %1s.

message.name: ERR_HBI_XFV_TOTAL_PAYMENT_AMOUNT_GREATER
message.locale: The payment amount entered, in addition to existing utility payments of %1s, must not exceed maximum amount payable to the utility of %2s.

message.name: ERR_UTILITYPAYMENT_AMOUNT_CANNOT_MODIFY
message.locale: The amount cannot be modified as payments have already been made in respect of this utility payment. To prevent further payments from being made, the end date can be modified. The earliest date that the end date can be set to is '%1d'.

message.name: ERR_UTILITYPAYMENT_MODIFICATION_ENDDATE_FAILURE
message.locale: The payment end date cannot be modified to a date for which payments have been made in respect of this utility payment. The earliest date that the end date can be set to is '%1d'.

message.name: ERR_UTILITYPAYMENT_STARTDATE_CANNOT_MODIFY
message.locale: The start date cannot be modified as payments have already been made in respect of this utility payment. To prevent further payments on this item, the end date can be modified. The earliest date that the end date can be set to is '%1d'.

message.name: ERR_UTILITYPAYMENT_STATUS_CLOSED
message.locale: The utility payment details cannot be modified as the utility payment has a status of closed.

message.name: ERR_UTILITYPAYMENT_STARTDATE_BEFORE_PAYMENT_TO_DATE
message.locale: The start date cannot be modified as payments have already been made on this date. The earliest date that the start date can be set to is '%1d'.
